subtasks: Identify areas with weeds in the garden
Spend 10 minutes daily removing weeds
Use hand tools to uproot weeds with roots
Check for pests or bugs daily
Prepare garden beds for planting sweet potatoes
Handle wet conditions affecting garden growth
Till garden beds
Heal potatoes (second time due to rain)
Monitor garden for weed growth
Address wet conditions affecting carrot and pea rows
Check onion harvest readiness
Identify areas with weeds in the garden

Use hand tools (like a hoe) to uproot weeds with roots
Check for pests or bugs daily
Prepare garden beds for planting sweet potatoes
Handle wet conditions affecting garden growth
Till garden beds

Monitor garden for weed growth
Address wet conditions affecting specific rows (carrots and peas)
Check onion harvest readiness
